https://www.instagram.com/p/CAq0B90DUby/

Brooklyn Film Camera and Cameradactyl are pleased to announce the launch of the Polaroid Scan Adapter V2. This tool helps you to scan your Polaroid 600 or SX-70 images easily, efficiently, and completely eliminates the dreaded Newton rings that usually come when scanning Polaroids on a flatbed scanner.

quote.msg:
https://www.instagram.com/p/CAq0B90DUby/

Brooklyn Film Camera and Cameradactyl are pleased to announce the launch of the Polaroid Scan Adapter V2. This tool helps you to scan your Polaroid 600 or SX-70 images easily, efficiently, and completely eliminates the dreaded Newton rings that usually come when scanning Polaroids on a flatbed scanner.
